name: Hasbro Minigame Madness
description:
Keyboard Controls - UIOP

Xbox Controller - Shoulder Buttons

Made for school making a game for the fictional "Simon X" device. We needed to make a game that Hasbro would back so we ended up creating Hasbro Minigame Madness.

Songs are from Sonic Colors, Bravley Default, Pokemon X/Y, Kirby Return to Dreamland, Wario Ware Smooth Moves, Wario Ware INC

Sound Effects from Smash Bros Melee and Brawl.

Made in Unity

Toni Conge - Programming

Matt Hazelworth - Hungry Hungry Hippo, Gator Golf, Candy Land, Don't Step in it and Mouse Trap art.

Ian Elquiero - Twister, Menu and Transition art 

Rob Dieterich - Simon X base
